title: Having issues Patching 7.9? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Mid-Season changes are here and apparently it comes in Cool Mint, Lime, and Maple flavors!  So hopefully a little something for everyone?

http://i.imgur.com/WFNEKpj.jpg

If you're itching to try out the Mid-Season changes or looking forward to how Ms. Rift Herald might shake up the meta but patching issues are keeping you down, check out the steps below which should get you into the client!

------------------------------------------------

>#***Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!***

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, a[nd unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#***“I’ve tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy”***

 We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#***"Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004"***

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#***"Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching" Error: 003***

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

>#***Weirdness with Rune Pages***

There can be an issue with rune pages not saving correctly when they have ***special characters*** in their name.  We're working on solving this in the future, but if this error happens to you, reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get you squared away.

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body:
Hey there!

I have a problem whit the update!
When I start a game the game is only in the right top corner of the screen and the rest is black.
I tried to re-instal the client but its still not working :(

Had the same problem.  Could see less than a quarter of the loading page (bottom left portion), so I quit and relaunched.  Same problem on reload.  Game started and only had a small, unplayable portion.  I apologized to teammates, saying I hoped they could remake, and quickly left.

Gonna test on custom games so I don't screw up anymore ranked games.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeuticus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BcyPtAVP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-05-03T12:34:17.557+0000)
>
> Had the same problem.  Could see less than a quarter of the loading page (bottom left portion), so I quit and relaunched.  Same problem on reload.  Game started and only had a small, unplayable portion.  I apologized to teammates, saying I hoped they could remake, and quickly left.
> 
> Gonna test on custom games so I don't screw up anymore ranked games.

same problem here

> [{quoted}](name=LUClFER,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BcyPtAVP,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-03T12:41:16.761+0000)
>
> same problem here

Same
Same problem

> [{quoted}](name=dawnbreakW,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BcyPtAVP,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-03T19:34:59.104+0000)
>
> Same problem

same on MBP 15 (and i got the afk ban and lost a ranked for this... lol)

So I hit Option + Enter and it switched to window mode which makes it playable. Hit it again to make it full screen which cures the quarter of the screen problem. However, a weird problem I've been getting once in full screen is I can't move the camera upwards. I can move it left, right and down to check the map, but it won't let me look up... very odd bug that they really need to fix...

For those mac users only see 1/4 of screen in the game, my temp SOLUTION is here. 
Hit Option+Enter to switch to window mode, then Hit it again to get back to full screen mode. (After this, as Permalink said above, you're not able to move your mouse upwards.) You need to change you resolution under VIDEO settings. Switch it a larger or smaller size should work. It seems there is a bug with the default setting. By the way, I'm using mac pro with Sierra system. 
Thanks to Riot, I spent another hour trying to solve the issue after I've debugged for a whole day - to say the least

Yep... same problem when I created a custom game against a bot.  Just a small portion of the screen is viewable.  

Playing on a MacBook Pro running system 10.11.6.
Same here. I have the same screen problem.
Hi.  I just tried to play a game, and it loads only in the top right side of my screen - the game is unplayable.  I am on the mac client.

Hey 

I had the same problem. All I did was, I opened options in game, draged the window so I cloud change resolution and changed it. After that it worked :D

Sorry for bad English

QUICK SOLUTION!!!!!

hey so i just tried to fix it, the onLy way right now is to go into the actual game settings while you're playing

go to video tab
go to window mode
switch from fullscreen to window

its a temp fix for now but it works!

Hey!

When I click to launch the game LoL does not open... what should I do?
Yeah, Same thing is happening to me too, I don't know whats wrong, me and my brother have the same laptop, but his is working just fine
same problem.

Okay I'm seriously annoyed. Update: 20 minute low priority que due to the one game I didn't participate in because I couldn't because I was trying to figure out how to fix my screen problem (Mac resolution / window can't see and low frame rate).  Punishing players for a crappy patch update that makes game play impossible and even costs games and elo because there isn't even a fucking NOTICE on behalf of Riot warning Mac users that this problem is common so it's best they don't jump straight into a game after updating/ patching and should instead test their first match on a custom for no penalties. Some of you may say it's common sense to do that, but really, it isn't. I wasn't expecting my game to fuck up and be unplayable after patching, this is NOT my fault. And really, from a game company this big, are we to expect such crappy patches/ updates? I don't think it's unreasonable of me to expect that Riot send out good, working patches for both Windows AND Mac. Or what, did they forget to test the patch on Macs? FFS. This is just ridiculous, feels like salt on top of a wound to get punished for not being able to play BECAUSE IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO. FYI, I ended up re-installing Windows on another partition through Bootcamp because honestly, the Mac client always has more problems and Riot hardly even communicates with Mac users or cares about its Mac client. Problems on the Mac client typically take forever to be patched / addressed or fixed by Riot. Frame rate still reads 60fps when I run League on Windows partition, but I doubt it's accurate; gameplay feels smooth as before. Definitely not the same as the 60fps when I run League on the Mac OSX partition, which is unplayable. Way too laggy / glitchy / delayed.

Hi, kinda need help please

Update got stuck at 677.6 MB left to download, tried restarting the same thing happens. My net speed are normal but the client shows otherwise. either the server stop requesting data packages or something went really wrong. Any solutions ?
I'm having the exact same issue. You find a solution?
same issue. solution? someone?
do a full repair. fixed for me...
i can only view a1/4 of my screen in match load screen and during match...

After the update, when I click "launch" the whole program closes. I have tried to re-install but the problem remains. Anyone who knows how to help me please let me know how to solve this issue

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

It kind of sounds like your OS might need some adjustments to it's [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) settings to allow League to run after the update. It's a pretty quick and simple fix, but definitely hit me back if those steps don't seem to help!

Anyone experiencing the same problem on mac? Contrary to most people who have the game on 1/4 of their screen, i have it full screen but with a heavy distortion of the in game image (abnormally widened), and this is for whatever resolution i try. Plus the mouse feels very fast and painfully kept under control (probably due to the wide scaling?). I tried to play a game or 2 but this is very hard and most of all hurts the eyes so much that i had to stop trying. I play on an imac 24" 3.06Ghz C2D, 8Gb DDR 1067Mhz, Nvidia GeForce GT 130 512Mb, OSX Lion 10.7.5. I had ZERO problems until this last update and new client (40 to 60 fps, 22ms ping). Here's a link for screenshot: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxBXOXyhDhqCS1hkZHdlUGNvLU0/view?usp=sharing
what about grey play button..
Hi, i tried to update the game and now the game just won't let me in. it stuck on Authenticating and i don't know how can i fix that. Plz help?

Using a Macbook I am not able to play full screen, it used to be i could only see the game in the top right corner of my screen now it cuts off about an inch or two off the top if I try and go full screen. I know other people on Mac are having this same problem

So I've run into a problem.  I log in but I can't click the "Play" button.  I hover over it and I get a message that says: "We weren't able to create a lobby right now.  Please exit the client and re-open to try again."  I've re-opened three times now and it won't fix.

So I recently got the patch update and whenever I get into the game the screen is black except for one tiny square at the top right-hand corner. This has never happened before, it just started to happen when i downloaded the Patch. If anyone has any ideas on how i can fix this please helllllllpppppp.
So after the update my screen would only show the bottom left side of graphics, I had to afk and now I'm on the afk buster. Thats not really fair.

This has been happening to almost every Mac user. Riot somehow messed it up. It makes me wonder it if was on purpose. A while back there was an issue that only affected Mac users (causing their games to freeze and crash or alt tab automatically in game), and I've never yet seen Riot respond to it. Here is the forum on the freezing issues for Mac users: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/n9EerAmd-mac-users-having-issues-with-patch-71

I have been trying to update the next patch whenever a new one comes out, with that i try to update the patch and i get a blue screen and it crashes my computer. This game has been my biggest issue, this kind of stuff does not happened to other games. Although i love playing league, it always does this with a new patch, so i end up having to uninstall the game and reinstall it. In the end this is just very time consuming and I'm getting sick of doing this every time, so if you can help me that would be GREAT!!! thanks{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

This sounds like a pretty severe issue, like hardware failure, if you're getting a blue screen.  As a first step, I definitely recommend double checking your pc vents and clear any dust in case of overheating.  If this persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you and find the issue.

Hi I'm getting this issue and would love some assistance

Update Failed
Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more
information.

Thanks
NoCakes

It sounds like you're still on the legacy client, how come?  You should try and transition asap so you don't run into problems when time comes!  To help with your issue, though, at what % exactly are you getting the unspecified error?  Let me know, and I'll be happy to help!

thanks for the quick reply

I'm getting to 33% on the 'calculating differences' part of update

Gotcha!  So at this phase, the patcher has finished getting your game files ready and is just now trying to connect to our patching servers for updates.  Your network might be blocking that connection from being made, so nothing is getting downloaded.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get through and grab those updates!

Hi again
followed the steps got the hextech repair tool, ran it and it thinks everything is fine

updated to new client to make sure it wasn't the old one causing problems but have been getting the error code 004

allowed the repair tool to do its thing again and it cant find the problem any ideas (I am running client as administrator)

thanks again

Woo, glad you made it to the updated client!  Did you go over each step of the connection guide, though?  The error 004 is what the updated client suggests if there's a connection issue or block preventing you from reaching our services.  Make sure to go over each step to fix up the connection problem!

right gone through everything on the connection issues and error 004 list and the client has finally moved past the part it was messing up at, after uninstalling and reinstalling as administrator (into new client):P

will add to this post if there are any more issues (fingers crossed)

Thank you for your help Porocles

There are all sorts of video problems with this patch. Im on a Mac and I can no longer use borderless mode. It forces itself to a quarter of the screen and is unmoveable. The resolutions in game are also incorrect on the Mac. Once again Riot amazes me. It doesn't allow me to use the 1280x800 setting without terrible distortion, which is the default mode for most Mac screens.
Is there a work around to the Direct X issue thats causing my game to crash and not open?

What's your current resolution at in-game?  There might be an issue being caused by using a custom resolution or exceeding 1080p.  If the game is crashing too often to find out, resetting your config should restore your resolution to default.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know, and if that helps!

I'm also having the Mac client problem. It's only using the top right quadrant of my screen, and it displays the lower left corner of the game in that quadrant. o_o 

Help me Riot, you're my only hope! *_*
i can't open my client at all. the logo just keeos being there, and nothing happens, anyone who know what I should do ?

It sounds like League is trying to load, but something is blocking it from opening correctly. Sometimes your operating can get a little trigger happy and think programs are dangerous, but you should be able to get around that by going through our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).

so everytime i launch a game my pc freezes and i have to restart my pc cant try to launch the game cuz this will happen again i tried so its instaloss for my team.

this only happens to league of legends and not  any other game

There could be a number of different reasons that your pc would freeze up like that when trying to start a match. A good first step would be to go over everything in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), but hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BcyPtAVP,comment-id=006f0000,timestamp=2017-05-14T20:31:07.326+0000)
>
> There could be a number of different reasons that your pc would freeze up like that when trying to start a match. A good first step would be to go over everything in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), but hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!

i kinda fixed it now i just can't alt+tab when i launch game or this will happen.

this started happening when i updated windows to creators update. so it might be something with that
